message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $15000, but I'm open to negotiation. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay up to $10000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12500? I'm confident you'll get great value from this product.
I'm still interested in the product, but $12500 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for it.
